archetypes.title: Take Profit / Stop Loss
archetypes.summary: Exit position when TP or SL threshold is reached (ATR or percentage based).
intent_phrases: take profit at a target and cut losses with a stop loss
exit when price hits a profit objective or a maximum drawdown
use ATR or percentage based stop losses and profit targets
set a clear take-profit and stop-loss level for each trade

archetypes.title: Trailing Stop
archetypes.summary: ATR-based trailing stop that moves with price in favorable direction.
intent_phrases: lock in profits with a trailing stop
exit only when price reverses by a trailing amount
move the stop up as price moves in my favor
use an ATR-based trailing stop to follow the trend

archetypes.title: Time-Based Exit
archetypes.summary: Exit position after a specified number of bars or time duration.
intent_phrases: exit the trade after a fixed amount of time
close the position after holding for N bars
be out of the trade by a certain time like Monday morning
time-based exit regardless of price action after a window

archetypes.title: Band-Based Exit
archetypes.summary: Exit when price touches or crosses a band edge (e.g., opposite band for mean reversion).
intent_phrases: exit when price touches the opposite band
close the trade when volatility bands are hit
take profits when price reaches an outer band
mean-reversion band exit when price tags volatility bands

archetypes.title: Structure Break Exit
archetypes.summary: Exit on structure break (breakout in opposite direction indicating trend reversal).
intent_phrases: exit when the trend structure clearly breaks
close the position when price breaks below recent swing lows
sell when support is broken in a long trade
cover the short when resistance is broken in a short trade

archetypes.title: Squeeze Compression Exit
archetypes.summary: Exit when volatility compresses back into squeeze (opposite of squeeze expansion entry).
intent_phrases: exit when volatility compresses again after an expansion
close the trade when price falls back into a volatility squeeze
take profits when the expansion phase ends and volatility dries up
get out when bands tighten back up after a breakout

archetypes.title: Cross-Sectional Rank Drop Exit
archetypes.summary: Exit position when rank drops below threshold or on rebalance when name falls out of top N.
intent_phrases: exit when a name drops out of the top momentum rankings
close positions when rank falls below a threshold
rebalance out of underperformers in a cross-sectional portfolio
sell when this asset is no longer in the top N by strength

archetypes.title: VWAP Reversion Exit
archetypes.summary: Exit when price returns to anchored VWAP (mean reversion target) or moves too far from VWAP.
intent_phrases: exit when price returns to anchored VWAP
take profits when price comes back to VWAP after a move
close the trade if price drifts too far away from VWAP
VWAP-based mean reversion exit around an anchor
